alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms set to move through Island Park through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Island Park Village to 9 miles west of Island Park Reservoir to 9 miles southeast of Idmon. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Sheridan Reservoir, Mesa Falls State Park, Big Springs, and Harriman State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain
